summary.what: Refactor init, doctor, setup, and uninstall to use AgentEnv interface
summary.why: Backward-compat JSON keys preserve existing consumers while step names and flags become generic, enabling future agent envs without CLI changes
summary.how: Doctor iterates AllAgentEnvs() for health checks. Init replaces --no-claude with --no-agent (deprecated alias kept). Uninstall gathers/removes all detected envs via AgentEnvState slice. Tests updated for agent_env step name.
